subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias scored his second goal of the game with 1 minute 44 seconds left in overtime last night, and the Devils extended their winning streak to eight with a 4-3 comeback victory over the Boston Bruins at the Prudential Center in Newark.
snippet: Patrik Elias scored his second goal of the game with 1 minute 44 seconds left in overtime last night, and the Devils extended their winning streak to eight with a 4-3 comeback victory over the Boston Bruins at the Prudential Center in Newark.
